emptyDashboard.title: Welcome to Your Dashboard!
emptyDashboard.description: Your admin panel is currently empty. You can start creating your own products, customers, and pages, or load some sample data to explore the features.

dashboard.noChartData: Not enough data to display chart.

payoutsWarning.title: Payout Configuration Pending
payoutsWarning.description: To receive payments, you must set up your payout method.

generateCodesModal.title: Generate Access Codes
generateCodesModal.noPages: No pages found. Create a page first.

payoutsPage.title: Set Up Your Payouts
payoutsPage.description: To receive funds from your sales, please choose a payout method. Onboard with Stripe for lower fees and full branding control.

option1.title: Option 1: Quick Start (Payoneer / Wise)
option1.description: Get started quickly. We will handle payouts to your Payoneer, Wise, or bank account via email.

option2.title: Option 2: Onboard with Stripe
option2.description: Get lower fees (0.50% + $0.10), use your own branding on checkouts, and enjoy unlimited transaction volume.

savingsCalculator.title: Estimate Your Savings
savingsCalculator.description: See how much you could save with our lower fees by onboarding directly with Stripe Connect.
savingsCalculator.footnote: Calculations are estimates based on an average transaction size of ${{avg_txn_size}}.

activePlatform.title: Quick Start Payouts Active
activePlatform.description: Your payouts will be sent via our platform to the details below. Fees are 0.75% + $0.15 per transaction.
activePlatform.upgradePrompt: Want lower fees and more control?
activePlatform.upgradeDescription: Upgrade to Stripe Connect to save money on every transaction and get unlimited transaction volume.

activeStripe.title: Stripe Connect Onboarded!
activeStripe.description: Your account is now connected to Stripe. You will now benefit from lower fees (0.50% + $0.10) and direct payouts.
activeStripe.limits: You now have unlimited transaction volume.
